comments_raw: ['Amazing art and fun game. The platforming and instant respawn when you fail a jump feel good. I really like the part where you turn the horizontal bug into a vertical one. Great job.COMMENT_END', 'Very nice adventure game and cute art. Inside the buildings the background tiles could have been more distinct from the floor tiles to make it a bit clearer.COMMENT_END', 'Excellent ! Clear and fun experience. Design is super cute, i want more !!COMMENT_END', 'Very fun and cute game, very cool graphics, nice way of storytelling with all the icons!COMMENT_END', "I managed to get the flower and its a really good journey and well thought out. I think the\xa0mechanics are really great and I liked how you can pick up the creatures and throw them. On my first try I accidently trapped myself inside the building and had to restart but other than that it's perfect, definitely a top tier game this roundCOMMENT_END", 'Beautiful art wraps this very polished platformer featuring a traditional fetch quest. I would had prefer a little faster movement as some areas are a little large (I went left first and had to backtrack). Also, in the vertical bugs section, it was difficult to see the red spikes at the bottom, maybe the camera could shift depending on the area. Great job overall!COMMENT_END', 'Get out of here with your fantastic games and give the rest of us a chance! ð\x9f\x98COMMENT_END', 'Very beautiful game that was very well done. This is one of my favorites from this round. Good work, no notes.COMMENT_END', 'What an adorably lovely game. I loved every second of playing this, so sweet and wholesome, and the puzzles were simple and easy to understand but still fun to complete. No notes, this was fantasticCOMMENT_END', "And there is more and more and mooore! This is a complete mini game. I couldn't believe how many mechanics there were and the progression with getting closer to growing the flower just felt amazing! One of my favorite entries.COMMENT_END", 'really fun but i couldnt finish it cause i accidentally softlocked myself here :LCOMMENT_END', 'I was addicted and completely zoned in, I\xa0needed to complete it! Amazing art, and music, and the progression...just five stars across the board.COMMENT_END', "Games like this really inspire me! There's a crazy level of polish on this for a 2 week game jam. The music, mechanics, and art style all blend in super nicely. The level design was really good. I like the order in which certain times/mechanics were introduced, and the hint system was great.COMMENT_END", 'Very cute little game!\xa0Pure fun )COMMENT_END', "The amount of art and content impresses me, I don't actually remember if I've seen a Construct game this well made before. Also, I love the little bugs walking around the map. Good work!COMMENT_END", 'This was very well done! Played through the whole game and enjoyed every bit of it! :DCOMMENT_END', 'I thought this game was great! I like that you can pick up like anything on the map lol. I think I may have accidentally skipped a big portion of the game by stacking all of the rocks on top of each other to directly get to the cat ladies house... but that just shows amazing amounts of player freedom! (please do not hate me for accidentally creating speed-running tech) Anyways, good job on the game!COMMENT_END', 'Finally managed to get that darn flower!Great use of tips and love the overall look and feel. Good laid back game.COMMENT_END', 'cute and fun game. love the main character.COMMENT_END', "Adorable, complete, and fun! The platforming didn't always feel the smoothest, particularly the jump between the left side of the map and the cat lady house felt a little too far to be comfortable with the provided mushroom on the closest tile. I loved the little puzzles, though; realizing I could pick up the mushrooms and the bugs was particularly satisfying.COMMENT_END", 'This game has a clean and shiny quality to it that i really like. I like the character sprites a lot. Nice work on the object-trade puzzle aspect. Very creative!COMMENT_END', 'The polish and level design here is great!\xa0 Excellent job as expectedCOMMENT_END', 'The artwork is next level.\xa0 Music fits well.\xa0 Sound effects would be a welcome addition, if you continue this game.COMMENT_END', "I really dig the art, and the quests were creative. For some reason I had a hard time pressing space, kept pressing x instead, I would've appreciated the ability to jump with up arrow instead. Went into the cave first but then after a bit I managed to lock myself in in the hay house...COMMENT_END", 'Fantastic game! \xa0Beautiful graphics with really fun animation.\xa0\xa0Easy mechanics and clever puzzles.\xa0\xa0Definitely one of my favorites. \xa0So impressed with how much you were able to create during the jam.\xa0\xa0I hope you get to continue this!COMMENT_END', 'Saw this on someone\'s "goated" list and yup this is definitely top 3 and I don\'t even what other two games would be. Best cartoony game I played in a while.COMMENT_END', "This game is great. I love the art style and overall it's very polished for a jam entry! I think my only complaint is that it was a bit easy, but that's kind of a personal preference thing. Great work on this it's one of my favs from the jam!COMMENT_END"]

['Brother to Inscryption. Everything was great with this game and when I was out of cards I was a bit in a stress. Clever mechanics and clean art style.\xa0 Just perfect!COMMENT_END', "Incredible game! The art is great and the mechanics work well. Can't wait to see what this game becomes in futur roundsCOMMENT_END", 'Really really great game! A well-designed card game with a real-time twist, and awesome dark aesthetics and nomenclature. Excellent job!COMMENT_END', 'I love the style so much. The mechanics were also very well implemented. I loved that you are allowed to use cards on enemies and get negative attack point on them, so their attacks heal you. This could be a really fun rogue-like deck builder if you decided to expand on it.COMMENT_END', "Oh man, this is great fun. I also REALLY love the polish around it, this might be the best looking and feeling game on the list so far! I did need a bit of time to figure out what was going on, so it might have needed more of a tutorial, but asides from that it's very engaging!COMMENT_END", 'The gameplay is quite unique and engaging.\xa0The\xa0auto-battling\xa0function\xa0might\xa0cause\xa0you\xa0to\xa0panic\xa0at\xa0first,\xa0but that\xa0only\xa0leads\xa0to\xa0your\xa0quick\xa0demise.\xa0Taking\xa0it slow\xa0and\xa0thinking\xa0about your\xa0actions\xa0is the\xa0way\xa0to\xa0go.\xa0I\xa0also\xa0like\xa0the\xa0feel\xa0of\xa0placing\xa0the\xa0cards,\xa0you\xa0did\xa0nice on\xa0that\xa0front.\xa0Keep\xa0it\xa0up,\xa0would\xa0love to\xa0see\xa0this\xa0game\xa0continued!COMMENT_END', 'Really cool game! I like the theme you went for and how it felt strategic to either cast your cards or sacrifice for my mana. Definitely need to see this be fleshed outCOMMENT_END', "Oh man I wanted to try this one as soon as I\xa0saw it on stream and it did not disappoint. Extremely well done! Reminds me of Inscryption in all the right ways, and your mechanics work really well together. No notes (other than maybe an interactive tutorial for the future) but can't wait to see what you add to this if you keep working on it!COMMENT_END", 'This game has come a long way since the first one I played weeks ago and all in good ways. The strategy feels better and the game is easier to understand. A freaking amazing game! IMO a top 5 game for sure.COMMENT_END', 'This game is really nice. Not my cup of tea normally, but I really liked this one. You did a good job, and I think your tweaks made the game feel so much better!COMMENT_END', 'Wow one ofâ\x80¦if not The BEST Itch.io Card Game!
The core and secondary mechanic works well and compliments each other
The soundtrack is also amazing!
No wonder you gave me a great idea to improve on my card game ð\x9f\x98COMMENT_END', "This was awesome! An active time card battling game is not something I've seen a ton of but it's a very fun concept and you executed it really well. The ability to use your cards to lower enemies attack into the negative and heal your own card is so cool. The constant ticking timer of the enemies attacks coming really leads to some fun stressful strategizing. Great work on this I really enjoyed it!COMMENT_END", 'Another rage inducing game! LOVE IT.\xa0 It took me a couple tries but finally beat it!\xa0 Are you wanting to expand it any?COMMENT_END', "The GOAT. Your game is awesome. It's nice to see how the game improved comparing to the early iterations, haha. Well done!COMMENT_END", 'Great Game! I ragequitted on the first 20 seconds but, ehhh, no body cares about thatCOMMENT_END', 'Great game. Great atmosphere. Great Ui design.COMMENT_END', 'Definitely top 10 materialCOMMENT_END', "Solid entry. The atmosphere is indeed great. Played it a bit before the deadline and tried it again now after the new patch, with the new UI and gameplay changes it feels much better. I could not beat the top guy's 1:09 time but I had lots of fun while trying to do so.One small note regarding the leaderboard is that it seems\xa0 to add a new entry after refreshing the browser even when entering the same name instead of updating an identical existing one on better score, which ends up clogging the leaderboard, especially when we keep refreshing on bad starts. Not that big of an issue though since the focus is on main mechanics and they are very well implemented.COMMENT_END", 'ð\x9f\x94¥\xa0Love the atmosphere + gameplay possibilities (boss progression is perfect too)COMMENT_END', 'Great atmosphere and fun mechanics that give the player a lot of freedom to experiment with and strategize!COMMENT_END', "Really great concept and shockingly good polish and visual style considering those weren't required.\xa0 Excellent as expected!\xa0 I can see this being a top ten for sure!COMMENT_END", 'I was confused at first, but I had a ton of fun once I understood how the game worksCOMMENT_END', 'One of the bests! Really cool graphics and tasteful gameplay. Finished it in 3rd try,I believe the trick to win is make your opponents attack negative so you can farm health of your hero :PCOMMENT_END', 'You sacrifice your time to make this game.COMMENT_END']

["This concept is so dope. Such a creative game, with great and simple rules. Can't wait to see you in round 2COMMENT_END", 'Wooh I LOVE the art. The gameplay is also very cool. First attempt I got to level three before I realized how the "mana" worked and got to level 7 the next time.\xa0 Not entirely clear what killed me but it is very interesting!COMMENT_END', 'this has lots of potential! Im surprised how complex it can get with all the mechanics you added. Also the bee being sad when you attack it makes me sad :(COMMENT_END', "It was more fun and advance that I first thought. Good job! I got to level 10 but I couldn't figure out how to save it to the leaderboard..COMMENT_END", 'Best game for me so far as I love card games and auto battlers, well done.COMMENT_END', "This game is really awesome. I like the auto play of the cards and it was clear exactly what was happening. There was a strategy for picking cards and dropping some. I'd love to see where you take this game!COMMENT_END", "Super cool game - I love it. Can't wait to see how you're going to develop this further (I hope you do). I really liked the graphics and animations and overall gameplay - super slick. Nice one!COMMENT_END", 'Cool game, It felt so good killing that bee on the start, revenge >:DCOMMENT_END', 'One of the few games I played on repeat! All the different cards being able to carry different strategies, slowly building up a wicked deck of various types of cards, this game rocks!COMMENT_END', 'This is insanely fun and polished. You are definitely gonna go far this year.COMMENT_END', 'Great game!COMMENT_END', "Love the game!! Love your art like always!! And such a great game\xa0mechanic, it's very addictive and fun to play and try out different strategies!!COMMENT_END", 'Really well made ! I chose the poison way and i think it was pretty effective. But ... why ... why killing such cute bees ??!COMMENT_END', 'Really well-made game with good art style and all, seriously one of the best entries here,\xa0but I feel like a murderer now.COMMENT_END', 'I really love it, the way on how we build our deck as the core and making the deck more effective through out the levels to complement the core is very fitting very cool concept!also poor beeð\x9f¥²COMMENT_END', 'Very very fun and well done! Always have loved deckbuilders but not much experience with autobattlers, yet it works surprisingly really well here - I like how you have a couple different playstyles mixed into decks already (straight up damage + crit, poison, or even books)COMMENT_END', 'Another great game from you Loten! Super fun to play, really nice using Calculus to squash stuff! Very nicely executed, with unique art and fun jokes. Went for the book deck, will now explore the poison one.COMMENT_END', 'Gameplay loop is fun and easy to understand!Buuuut i feel bad hurting all the cute animals lolCOMMENT_END', 'Very fun game - the combination of autobattler and deck builder feels great. I like the design of adding cards that do no damage but increase your gold. The tutorial could be more detailed, but the UI and game design helped me understand the game immediately. Great job!COMMENT_END', "First off, I LOVE deckbuilders so I'm absolutely biased but I had a great time playing this. Honestly no criticisms from me,\xa0 it's lacking some variety and a little bit repetitive\xa0 but nonetheless I'm so hyped to see where this goes. This has reinvigorated my fixation on making a deckbuilder. I'm not fully sure what the primary and secondary mechanics are but they seem to be buying cards from the shop and combat. If you make it to round 2 please develop this further <3 It's already making my monkey brain happy seeing numbers go up and if/once there's more\xa0â\x9c¨juiceâ\x9c¨ added I might get\xa0addicted. Good luck!COMMENT_END", 'This was definitely one of my favorites. I recognize your art style from the 2024 GDKO video and I have a feeling you will go far again this year as well!COMMENT_END', 'This was incredible.\xa0 Even in just a few rounds I was getting a sense for different strategies to lean into to get further.\xa0 I could see this being a larger game for sure!\xa0 Full five stars from me!COMMENT_END', 'Fun game! cool to see the bugs returning once moreCOMMENT_END', 'VEry good and very addictive! Almost feels polished as well!COMMENT_END', "This was a lot of fun. It's pretty simple to figure out how everything works and it's so fun to get a juicy machine gun hit with a lot of buffs before it to wreck the enemies. Definitely seems like there's a lot of room to expand upon ideas in this one. I\xa0ended up making it to wave 8 on my best run. Great job!COMMENT_END", 'Cool concept! I can see it goes further!COMMENT_END', 'This is a cool concept. I love deckbuilders and I think there is something here but it needs some tweaks. I guess enemies will attack at some point but I feel I donâ\x80\x99t have any control on whatâ\x80\x99s going to happen the way it is right now. Maybe you could add some secondary mechanic during the battle itself to influence the result, maybe something as simple as skiping a drawn card to play the next with some penalty?COMMENT_END', 'Really fun cards, but would have liked to choose the card myself, really fun game though!COMMENT_END', 'I love deckbuilding games. I had fun playing this.COMMENT_END', 'Thank you for giving us this needed revenge that felt really goodCOMMENT_END']

game_title: the best platformer since that one game
comments_raw: ['I love the art style and the music in this game, it has such a nice vibe. The mechanics work great together, this is super fun!COMMENT_END', 'I kind of dig the simple look of this game.\xa0 Love the way you teach us how to play as we move through the first few screens. \xa0Great use of the mechanics.\xa0\xa0Really well done! \xa0I hope you get to continue with this one.COMMENT_END', 'Got the two mechanics down. Loved the interaction between them. Great game!COMMENT_END', 'simple but effective. love itCOMMENT_END', "Super well done, an idea for a platformer I would have never thought of. Sidenote, I don't know what you did for the physics and character controller, but it is extremely well done.COMMENT_END", "A fun and difficult platformer! The levels were well designed. One cool thing I'll note is this strategy where you jump off a box then grab it really quick then jump off it midair. Along with that the platforming was great too.COMMENT_END", 'A very tricky platformer, even at the start.\xa0 Very interesting mechanics though.\xa0 Was still quite fun to play.COMMENT_END', "Suuuper fun game!! Honestly don't have much else to say, it was really well implemented, great job!COMMENT_END", 'very fun too play!COMMENT_END', 'really liked it!COMMENT_END', 'It was really fun to play and kind hard to get the gist of it at first. I really like how the apparent\xa0simplicity of the mechanic also gives you space to be creative and find your own way to face the lvl, I personally found myself constantly throwing \xa0the movable boxes to the little guy\xa0and sending it flying hahaCOMMENT_END', "It's crazy to see the way this ended up after playtesting it with you. Great job!COMMENT_END", "Probably my favourite game I've played so far. It was challenging, but in a way that you want to master it. Mechanics really well implemented.\xa0 My cup of tea.COMMENT_END", 'Great idea!, i didnt like the demo but when i learned the flicking it became became WAY WAY more fun, love the little text, i actually dont have any real feedback, its greatCOMMENT_END', 'Was fun playing this on stream!\xa0 Unique idea.\xa0 I love the idea of manipulating levels to help you progress.COMMENT_END', 'Art and music stayed simple but also kept me vibing. Which was good, cuz i got really mad playing it. hard game, fun mechanics :)COMMENT_END', "Super fun game! I loved all the different movement tech available to launch yourself around and it made speedrunning very fun. I do think the game should be fully beatable without it, though, as it isn't greatly intuitive and a little temperamental. I'd love to see new levels and mechanics in the future, well done!COMMENT_END", "i keep coming back to play this one, it's very fun. I hope you keep working on it in the future. (If you ever want someone to help you make levels, i know a guy *wink*)COMMENT_END"]

['I liked this game a lot. I love how quick and easy it is to understand the game. Also, great job on all the upgrades/abilities! Very fun stuffCOMMENT_END', "Really cool idea for a platformer and speedrun game! My best time ended up being 7.59. All the mechanics feel really great and there are a lot of them too which is impressive. I would've liked maybe some more levels to really get to utilize the mechanics after unlocking them, but not a huge deal or anything. Great work on this!COMMENT_END", 'This was a super fun game. I love how youve taken the idea of a speedrun game and added the abilities to get it done faster. One thing I would suggest though, is that i unlocked more than half of the abilities after the first run so you could probably make it a bit harder to get the abilities. I would love to see this game get worked and improved apon with more levels and abilities. Amazing work!COMMENT_END', 'Asking for a speed run is a clever way to increase playtime :) It could be little bit bigger map to see the effect of upgrades but good job at all!COMMENT_END', 'I love the art and all the mechanics were very well done. I think a harder level would have made the game more engaging since players would have slow starting scores and the various additional abilities would be more able to boost their speeds.COMMENT_END', 'Really interesting concept, i think the level is a bit too short as i was able to get a pretty fast score on my first try so the upgrades werent super useful, otherwise great\xa0job!COMMENT_END', 'I think you could do some cool things with this. I already had a pretty good score the first time around. I think you could push the speedrun part even further, for example at the start make it almost impossible to beat the game in a short amount of time. For example you can give the player the speed of a turtle initially or\xa0you need to take a longer route because your jump is not high enough yet, that would be an easy way to extend the gameplay and could even be funny.COMMENT_END', 'Cute game and quite addictive - nice one! The movement is super smooth and I love the secondary mechanic of adding new abilities.COMMENT_END', "WR? lol. This is a great game! Can't wait to see this in round 2COMMENT_END", 'Very very good idea\xa0 !COMMENT_END', 'This is one very good concept which I\xa0would love to see get more worked on. WELL DONE :DCOMMENT_END', 'Itâ\x80\x99s like a whole metroidvania in one small level :) The mental progression of mechanics is excellently traced - mastering the abilities the character already has, and by overcoming each time threshold, we gain new abilities that we can also learn to use and complete the level even faster.COMMENT_END', 'This game is actually wicked! YOU ADDED A GRAPPLE HOOK! The movement, the different cards, the unlocking system, the core gameplay loop. I love absolutely everything about this game!COMMENT_END', 'Super fun! My little goldfish-brain attention span stayed engaged!COMMENT_END', 'Really liked this game, was fun trying out all the abilities to try to get a faster time. Well done!COMMENT_END', 'Quite an interesting premise.\xa0 Very fun to play.\xa0\xa0The platforming is really well done and feels great, which is more difficult to accomplish than it might seem.\xa0 I can see a lot of interest in this type of game.COMMENT_END', 'Dude, the movements were perfect! I only found a bit slippery the walking, but dude, you are going to win this!COMMENT_END', 'GOSH this game is CUTE and COOLEverything you need in a game jam gameI wanna see this concept expanded to have different and limited abilities to mix and match. Could have a lot of depth and meta discussion around best builds and speedruns!COMMENT_END', '9 seconds . best game ever.COMMENT_END', 'I really like the idea and the art of this game.COMMENT_END']

['This is a clever platformer.\xa0 I love games that take something simple like "jump" and turn it into something special. Good job!COMMENT_END', 'Fun and challenging game. Good artwork too. I really liked this game.COMMENT_END', 'Very good-looking game! And an interesting idea too!COMMENT_END', 'Was super fun playing this on stream.\xa0\xa0Overall design is spot on.\xa0\xa0Great visuals, great audio.COMMENT_END', 'Well done! :DCOMMENT_END', 'I flew too far and got lost haha, the game looks funny/amusingCOMMENT_END', 'This did feel like a cool upgrade on flappy bird. \xa0I never quite got the hand of this (or flappy bird) - I seem to be a magnet for walls and traps. \xa0Still, I thought this looked and sounded great. \xa0 Well done.COMMENT_END', 'THE ULTIMATE FORM OF FLAPPY BIRD WE ALL NEEDED. Very good, very good. Thank you for spawning this.COMMENT_END', 'art is 10/10, gameplay tooCOMMENT_END', 'The background art is just... wow. It is absolutely stunning! Your jump being on a timer is a really interesting idea that ended up making for some cool level designs. Great stuff man!COMMENT_END', "This was a lot of fun. I love platformers and having the auto jumping mechanic was a nice twist I've not really seen much. I really liked the ramping up of difficulty and would've absolutely played more if there were more levels. I really love the art style as well! Great job on this!COMMENT_END", 'Ay, what an amazing and cute game. I like the idea of automatic jumping for the platformer, haha. Well done, i liked it!COMMENT_END', 'Absolutely love this!COMMENT_END', 'Loved this game! made some challenging levels and I love the flaps being changed smart for mixups.COMMENT_END', 'Loved the art-style and music. Very tricky to get through the levels but the concept for the mechanics are really cool. Well done!COMMENT_END', 'good game the one thing missing is the restart key its realy needed but apart from that realy polished gameCOMMENT_END', 'nice idea and i think it was pretty well implemented. taking away some of the choice of the player on choosing when to jump adds for a fun mechanic that works well with the difficult platforming.COMMENT_END', 'Good visual (that city background ð\x9f\x91\x8cð\x9f\x91\x8c). Very fun mechanic (a bit hard to get but very fun once I got it). Game has a great potential!COMMENT_END', 'very visual, mechanic was difficult but playable, and that gorgeous background will be in my dev dreams. Good job, felt really complete :) I hope you had fun making itCOMMENT_END', 'Great game!The concept is very interesting and unique.My only points of improvement if I were you would be to tighten the hitboxes, and maybe lower the audio levelsCOMMENT_END', 'nice game, but I think level nr 2 showed, that you  neednâ\x80\x99t use the  secondary mechanic alwaysCOMMENT_END', "This is great tho I'm sad that you didn't choose up (w) instead of e to glide, would be smoother, bit a fine entry nevertheless.COMMENT_END", 'Nice job! Gliding would be active as much as you press as a suggestion but it still works good\xa0:)COMMENT_END', 'awesome stuff buddy. looking forward to where you take it next.COMMENT_END']

['Loved Your Game, Your game perfectly fulfills the primary and secondary core mechanics!\nthis type of unique games I always like to play. Amazing Work.COMMENT_END', 'This game is awesome. You definitely have a the gift of making a game funny! The tutorial bullies had me rolling. Really really cool project!COMMENT_END', 'Fun and polished Game!COMMENT_END', 'Wow, what a delight. I love the stle of this game and how all the art really comes together. For some reason i really loved the representation of how long you had left being a wheel in the corner and it was cool to see the lighting change with it.A tutotorial is always nice in a game jam game and was happy to see you had one. It was clear, simple and did the job.... and then i saw there was an interactive tutorial level too!? AMAZING! It also really helped to add more charm and character to add to the art style. The tutorial bugs throwing shade was a lot of fun and i think it demonstrated the concepts well.COMMENT_END', 'Man, this is perfection! You need to continue this, I loved the ideaCOMMENT_END', 'Ah, it was very fun ))) And challenging! The first level was pretty easy, but the second forced me to restart a couple of times )COMMENT_END', "Really unique and interesting mechanics! There is a lot of game here and some really interesting systems, I'm not even sure how you implemented the collision for jumping it works really well and fits the shape of the ball. Wild.Awesome job!COMMENT_END", "The style was the strongest in this one, but going by the tutorial I expected a story game instead of this PVE-type of arena rolling. Even the bubbles were there, it could've been. Sometimes the bots like to get stuck and do nothing, but in the larger map they at least tried to win.COMMENT_END", 'The tutorial level is the greatest level in the game, I need a longer story campaing for this game (something metroidvanish maybe). PVP is also a fun addition as a game mode.COMMENT_END', "Good use of shader aesthetically good design, I don't know why but I just keep smiling when I play it I guess it's been so long since I played a cute games like this, I'll be discovering more other genre of games because of this thanks for inspiring me.everything works perfectly the rolling speed the hill push and sometimes the mushroom is op when climbing but I like it, the\xa0only complain I have is the camera controls other than that a solid entry ð\x9f\x92ªð\x9f«¡COMMENT_END", 'PEAK DUNG!!!, LOVE THE CARTOONY OUTLINE\xa0 SHADER!!! Will be fun to play with friends and see who gets the largest dung.COMMENT_END', 'First one played on stream!\xa0\xa0And man, was it fun.COMMENT_END', 'I liked everything about this game and can see this as a fun party game or online multiplayer game. Very well done!COMMENT_END', 'Art style and visuals are fantastic!\xa0reminds me of risk of rain 2COMMENT_END', 'it passed the vibe check with flying colors, really loved all the polishCOMMENT_END', 'I would definitely see an online party game with theses mechanicsCOMMENT_END', "I'm gonna admit i got mad at the camera at some point. Very fun game ! The vibes is great and i want to play more level !COMMENT_END", 'This is a very\xa0cool game, very fun and easy to learn. Very easy to learn the controls, and looks absolutely beautiful. Well done!COMMENT_END', 'peak. really peak.i want more of what is in your storage right now.COMMENT_END', 'Fantastic looking game. \xa0Love the concept and the whole rolling mechanic. \xa0Really polished and impressive for a jam. \xa0This is another winner for sure.COMMENT_END', 'Awesome mechanics! very creative and well implemented :)COMMENT_END', 'Amazing!COMMENT_END', 'Such a fun game! Very cool idea, well executed!COMMENT_END', "Wow this game is adorable! So much silly fun too, a fantastic casual game that as I'm sure many others have said would work great as a multiplayer game, local or otherwiseCOMMENT_END", 'This game is just great. I love katamari so I really enjoyed this game as well. The art looks great, it's fun to play, I really enjoyed this one. Fantastic work I am really impressed.COMMENT_END", 'This would be a great little multiplayer game!COMMENT_END', "The movement is a little clunky but, other than that, it's a really fun game.COMMENT_END", "Fun game! It's the first Katamari-type game I've tried. The variety of items you've included shows great potential. I'm excited to see where this goes in the future.COMMENT_END", 'Fun prototype. Was really well polished and was a very chilled experience. Great job!COMMENT_END', 'I am the giant beetle that makes all of the rules. I am the winner of many dung battles. No mere human can fathom the ball I\xa0am rolling.COMMENT_END', "Great synergy between the main and second mechanic, love the abilities you gain that help you reach new places. The tutorial is awesome and of course the rest is too. But seriously, I had the most fun in the tutorial, I wouldn't mind having a game about traversing more linear levels with your growing/shrinking ball.COMMENT_END", 'Great game! Really got to look for feedback on this one. Would be nice to see what the enemies got in score making it a bit more suspensefull. Also not sure but you can click the items youve picked? If its the case maybe binding it to u button instead of clicking on it would be smoother with the other controls.Great fun and I love the art!COMMENT_END', 'Fun game! Love that you added AI enemies, it adds a lot to the gameplay. Also, very nice visual style! Good stuff :DCOMMENT_END', 'Loved it! Was so fun! Short and polished game! Good job! :COMMENT_END']

['The jump and run mechanics were implemented nice. although I would have seen each of them as their seperate mechanic. So wall jumping and dashing would already be 2 mechanics. The Boxes were a bit though to place in the lava but other than that a solid entry!COMMENT_END', 'This was fun. Found the controls to help with the frustration which added to the fun.COMMENT_END', 'Wall jumping is extremely satisfying. Sometimes it is hard to get through small gaps because of it but overall its great.COMMENT_END', 'Very nice smooth movement, character just pleasant to control )COMMENT_END', 'Epic stuff. Reached the end around 2:59 in the speed run mode. I Wish if it was less slippery especially when jumping on boxes placed on lava. 10/10 fun game though and cool mechanic with grabbing and throwing boxes. Well done!COMMENT_END', 'The controls feel nearly perfect! Everything felt so smooth and natural and the visuals are really nice as well! I also enjoyed all the various dialogue you put into the game. Overall a lot of meaningful choices that sum up to a superb platformer.COMMENT_END', 'love the wall jump mechanic both core and secondary pretty fitting and does complement wellloved it!COMMENT_END', "Fun game! Thecontrols felt very nice which made it an enjoyable experience overall. The controls were a bit slippery, which was actually very fun\xa0at some parts but the levels are designed at points to make you do precise movements, which don't feel good.\xa0I feel like the dash was underused, especially since it just gets taken away from you at multiple points.\xa0Although it adds more of a challenge, just removing the player's ability to do something doesn't feelgreatand I would also consider the fact that managing to skip parts of the level or do it in an unintended way is way more fun - even if it's way harder sometimes.\xa0Also carrying the boxes felt a little bit weird and they were VERY easy to smuggle in different places throughout the levels. The main menu felt a little unintuitive, but it wasn't that bad. A lot of these are little nitpicks but I think my main issue was with the camera.\xa0With the speed at which the player is going if you head in a direction the camera lags behind you, leaving only ~15% of the screen focused on where you're actually going. I see you're using unity and would guess you are using cinemachine, maybe increase the lookahead time in the body of the camera? I usually do that for my games.COMMENT_END", 'Great job! I even had a go on the speedrun mode and managed a time of around 3 minutes.\xa0Really solid entry.COMMENT_END', 'The movement controller felt great, but dropping the boxes of felt a bit finicky/buggy at times. I that you had like a secret extra level inside the portal, it surprised me! I also liked that you incorporated some story elements.COMMENT_END', 'This is a really good game with some very challenging jumps and feats. I really liked it, and the signpost character was well-written too. Good stuff. Billy World rules!COMMENT_END', 'Man, you checked all boxes! a very solid entry, straight to the point. And\xa0I liked how many elements (double jump, wall jump) you implemented and all very well! I appreciate the tutorial, was well done as well. The level design is clear and I like the dynamic feel of the game. Really great job, 5/5!COMMENT_END', 'Fantastic Game! You improved it so much since last time I played it! The only problem was that I\xa0struggled to get out of the settings. Otherwise, game is Awesome! Love to see more :DCOMMENT_END', 'this was fun to play. i thought the menu could be more intuitive, i did get stuck a couple times before i got the game going. i wanted lest left-ride slide, but that could easily just be a personal preference.\xa0the environment was engaging yet classy, my favorite part was the secret level. I hope you had fun making it :)COMMENT_END', 'Great platformer! The player character is very cute. Some small platforms feel a little too slippery. Maybe you could make them slightly bigger than they actually are. But still, very good game!COMMENT_END', 'Very nive platfromer game with elements of puzzles, haha. Well done!COMMENT_END', 'cute and buttery smooth!COMMENT_END', 'love the player! very lovely! billy is love billy is life, i dont really like how the tilemap doesnt at all go with the player, but with a change of tiles i could see this getting successful, good luck!COMMENT_END', "Super cute! The idea has a lot of potential, and the premise of being a little blobby experiment guy gives things a fun sci-fi twist. I didn't love the character movement-- it felt very slippery and unwieldy, flying over platforms and bouncing off of walls in a manner that felt uncontrolled. I also really wanted to remap my box-grabbing key a lot of the time to something easier to use alongside WASD, like ctrl or shift.COMMENT_END", 'Such a charming game!! i like the spanish speaking boxCOMMENT_END', "This was a fun platformer! I like the movement a lot it feel well implemented and the wall jump is great. I agree with what someone said about the boxes and the lava below, but I think that's my only constructive criticism for the game. Great work on this I think I played thru everything including the secret world!COMMENT_END", 'Love the walljump it legit is the best feeling walljump ive felt ina\xa0 platformer rn, really cool game!!COMMENT_END', 'Movement and jump are very well implemented. itâ\x80\x99s so fun.COMMENT_END', 'I could see myself playing this game. I would tweak a couple things around the boxes in the lava, they float away too easily, kept falling because the boxes moved under my feet, also, I wouldnâ\x80\x99t allow to pick the box if you are standing on it because again, I kept falling in the lava. After that segment the rest was very enjoyable.COMMENT_END', 'nice platformer! I liked the story behind it tooCOMMENT_END']

I will come back when the voting beigns.COMMENT_END', "This was a really nicely presented and fun puzzle game. I think the mechanics worked well together and you did a great job of slowly inbtroducing concepts to the player and exploring differnt ideas as the levels progressed. The tutorial text was clear and helpful.\xa0I thought the actual mechanics were well implemented and everything, at least on my playthrough, worked really well. I saw you put quite a few times about the 'Wonky physics' but i wouldnt worry too much about it, I think people expect some oddities with physics based games and its part of the charm!I found it a little unintuative that the distance of the mouse controlled the power. My muscle memory kept taking over and assuming that it was how long i help the mouse down for, so id just have to watch the ball pathetically dribble away out the cannon at no speed quite a lot ð\x9f¥².\xa0 That is on me though i think. However, i really would love to be able to just re-shoot without replacing the door! especially when i kept messing up.COMMENT_END", 'Super fun! Unique game, with polished mechanics. There's a bit of a game breaking bug on lvl 9 where you can shoot at\xa0the wall and it phases through to the other cannon, but I love this ideaCOMMENT_END"]

['Excellent job! I\xa0had so much fun with this :)COMMENT_END', 'Such an awesome take on the puzzle platformer genre. One of my favorite entries!COMMENT_END', "This is one of the best games in this jam. I've never seen a game like this, the idea of switching blocks, but being able to move inside these blocks is amazing. Good Job!COMMENT_END", 'This is so awesome. The concept works so well and the variety shapes can be used for so many different things! In future levels you could even swap some of the shapes for even more possibilities.I\'m guessing it\'s probably to save dev time, but I really liked the "one big level" approach which let the player go their own non-linear path. I say keep it like that, you can still have "levels" like a normal puzzle game but have each level contain a few coins that you can pick in whatever order you\'d like.Only critique I have on the mechanics is that it did feel a bit janky when you were inbetween tiles, one puzzle could be solved by just spamming and hoping it lines up instead of doing the proper approach. But at the same time I like the fluidity of the movement, a grid based one maybe wouldn\'t feel as good. I guess you could make it so that the player smoothly "snaps" when you try to shapeshift, but otherwise have the movement as fluid as it is now.COMMENT_END', "This was such a cool mechanic! It was fun navigating the levels and trying to get all the coins shifting my block shapes around. I managed to get 9/10 coins, but the one in the top right I couldn't manage to get. Great work on this it's very cool!COMMENT_END", 'This is amazing! Great mechanics, super fun!COMMENT_END', 'Very unique idea and GREAT puzzles. Need more )COMMENT_END', "Very fun puzzles, and very unique concept for a platformer! I also love the art style, it's simple and cute. The gameplay kinda reminds me of some odd mobile games I would find on the app store. Not a bad thing, though. Gameplay mechanics were implemented beautifully. Not much else to say, you killed it!COMMENT_END", 'Very nice idea!But dat\xa0 music killing me xDCOMMENT_END', 'Very GOODCOMMENT_END', 'this is very well thought and implemented love the idea of fitting shapes to progress through out the levels and the level design is well madei like it alot!no i didnt played this for 10 minutes straight bcs of figuring out what shapes i should use to get a single coin where apparently i only need to use the T shape 2 times to get the coinCOMMENT_END', 'very exciting mechanics. I hope to see the sequel!)COMMENT_END', 'The shape changing and face moving mechanics were brilliant and fun! Great game!COMMENT_END', "Such a unique and interesting game idea! The jump felt really bad though, probably because of the lack of coyote time and because you couldn't even go up 1 tile, making it near useless. Sometimes it felt really hard to line up the shape right, maybe if they're close enough the shapes you turn into automatically snap into a grid so that you don't have to get them perfect. I think this would be really awesome as a metroidvania (metroidbrainia?) type game where you have to find new shapes to access different areas. I also kind of wish there was the ability to move my face without moving the shape (or needing a wall), especially since the WASD keys weren't used at all. Well done!COMMENT_END", 'Very clever. I think the game could benefit from implementing coyote time and jump buffering. That or you could\xa0remove the ability to jump and make the player rely purely on the shape-shifting and face moving mechanics.COMMENT_END', 'I was actually amazed on how smooth the movement and shape shifting were. A fantastic game overall!COMMENT_END', 'Best game everCOMMENT_END', 'I loved this puzzle game. \xa0First, great tutorial system. \xa0Second, clever and original mechanics. \xa0Easy to learn and fun to play.\xa0\xa0This is a winner!COMMENT_END', 'Great game. would love to play more levels weather during or after this jam!\xa0\xa0just nailed it...COMMENT_END', "Very creative idea and some very cool puzzle design. The gaps feel a little bit too tight. I think it is great for a puzzle game, but I get stuck easily trying to move the face, especially when trying to move the face down when I am in T shape. It might be better to make the movement grid-based for the tight puzzle design and avoid the stucking issue. Amazing game - can't wait to see what you make in round 2.COMMENT_END", 'SO fun to play! :DCOMMENT_END', 'coool !!!COMMENT_END', 'This one was incredible as expected!\xa0 Really good use of level design to really highlight your mechanics as well.\xa0 The one, very nitpicky thing I would say is that there were a few times that I had it figured out but it wasn\'t letting me shapeshift because I wasn\'t in quite the right spot.\xa0 \xa0A little bit of wiggle room or "close enough moves into place" would be nice!\xa0 All in all great job and a full five stars from me!COMMENT_END', "The shapeshift feels really satysfying to use since we can move in the form and the puzzles were fun. Can't wait to see even harder one with more shapeCOMMENT_END", 'Nice spin on the classic platformer. In some cases I found it would be nice if the shape shifting was a little more forgiving, e.g. if it almost fits then just automatically move it to make it fit.COMMENT_END']

['well doneCOMMENT_END', 'Well done, nice idea.COMMENT_END', 'Very fun to play. Well done my friend :DCOMMENT_END', 'For some reason I had so many ties )))COMMENT_END', 'This was so fun! Such a unique concept, I really loved the poker and cooking crossover. I think I noticed one glitch, I had 4 lives, and I\xa0had 4 wins, and won again. It took me to a "you lost" screen instead of a winning screen. This has so much potential, and I\'d love to see where you take it!COMMENT_END', 'Great take on poker. The upgrading of the food was an awesome idea. I had a lot of fun playing this game.COMMENT_END', "Quite challenging game. It's a bit difficult to get a good build going, but it's satisfying when you do. It felt like a lot of the time was spent waiting for the competition to finish, though. That's my only nitpick, you have a pretty solid entry.COMMENT_END", 'Of all the games I played this jam, this is the one I keep coming back to. Bravo.COMMENT_END', "This is so fun. It took me a little bit to understand how everything worked, but once I got it I was making the best soup of all time. Such a great spin on the super auto pets auto battler type of game. I would've absolutely kept playing if the game were longer I was having a great time with it, I especially like being able to merge the ingredients. Great work on this it's very fun!COMMENT_END", 'This is such a clever twist on super auto pets. As a game, this is very good. As a prototype? Unbelievable. Incredible. Very well done my friend.COMMENT_END', 'Amazing game. I really enjoyed playing it. Saving this to my collection so i could play in my free timeCOMMENT_END', 'Really cool! Quite a complex game with the UI, but you managed to pull it off, well done! I wish it would show the specific things used in each poker hand as it gives the points, like 3 apples popping out of the stew when I get a three of a kind, that would make it even more engaging.COMMENT_END', "I was cooking up a storm! If only winning hands of\xa0poker was this simple in real life -\xa0 I'd be rich :(A little scary to begin with but once I'd calmed down and read the instructions I was bankrolling. Could benefit from a tutorial playthrough but time was obviously a factor in that. Great game.COMMENT_END", "This is actually a really fun game. I almost bounced off of it because I didn't understand it at first, but it's actually awesome once you get the hang of it.COMMENT_END", 'once i figured out how to play, i started slaying enemy teams with my monstrous masses of melon and salt. ty for some entertaining gameplay, i hope you had fun making it :)COMMENT_END', "i think this is a millions of dollars idea to be honest, it's such a fun game with so much potential. it was REALLY confusing at first but i powered through it and managed to win a bunch of times with grapes and other fruit. it was a lot of fun! stick with it, and focus on making the game as readable and understandable\xa0as possible, and you could have a seriously great game on your hands!COMMENT_END", 'i think this game could be potentially fun but it was to hard to understand\xa0 what to do and how things were scored even after reading the instructions. Especially liked the\xa0artwork. Did its job in\xa0 drawing me in. Maybe make it a lil bit more clear on what to doCOMMENT_END', 'These types of games are very dear to my heart!COMMENT_END', 'Core mechanic: Team builder.Secondary mechanic: Fight other peoples teams.Progression: after each fight you can update your current team.If I could develop further I would try and add more modifiers, some sort of chef system where you will be forced to cook a certain way (vegi, all meat,...) and also make this an async multiplayer.COMMENT_END']

['I loved it, got to 163 score! I think it could be expanded to be even better!COMMENT_END', "The blocking and parriyng\xa0mechanics feels great. I do wish the enemies would spawn and attack faster cus sometimes you mess up and you just stare at the fucker for 10 seconds. ['where is coyote time, lol?COMMENT_END', 'Loved how you could bounce with the sword! I agree about adding Coyote time, I struggled with\xa0the controls until I got used to it. ['when you finnish change title.\xa0Good Game.COMMENT_END', 'Fun little game with an interesting mechanic. Nice job!COMMENT_END', 'Very clever. I hope you decide to continue. ['I\'d really love to see where you go with this!\xa0 For now the crafting was kind of just "find the biggest thing you can make," but Io could see it adding a really interesting puzzle element to the rpg stuff!\xa0 Cool idea!COMMENT_END', 'Love the GameBoy styling, Clever mechanics too, not what I expected, and funny too!\xa0ð\x9f\x98\x81 Curious to see where you go with it. I honestly have no criticism, this is cool.COMMENT_END', 'This game took me back to the kind of games I played in my youth. \xa0The game is very clever and funny.\xa0 I enjoyed the turn based combat. \xa0I hope you get a chance to build upon this.COMMENT_END', 'Love the comedy story!! Enjoyed the art and would like to see what you do next with this!COMMENT_END', 'The crafting mechanique is really clever, I can see it giving the player a lot of choice of action during their turn with each craft doing something unique. The dialogue was is aslo really\xa0entertaing. Congrats on making my favorite game of this first round and I hope to see your works on the next rounds.COMMENT_END', "The game is comedy gold and narratively\xa0very amusing, I REQUIRE MORE. I also see some potential in the turn-based combat itself. I think it doesn't require that much strategic thinking in the demo as it is, but I can definitely see that happening in the future versions of the game.COMMENT_END", 'Such an epic story, visuals and design on the game. The gameplay itself is also very creative, I like it a lot!COMMENT_END', 'Crafting objects to attack with was a cool idea and the game was fun. I really liked the GB art style, it looked great. I definitely would love to see more of this game.COMMENT_END', 'So much fun!COMMENT_END', 'An interesting mash up of genres to be sure. The narrative elements were very clear and the mechanic worked well for the situation at hand!COMMENT_END', 'Art was cute, the controls were unclear to me initially\xa0even though it was explained lol. i just randomly hit buttons and then the game progressed. Small game but fairly fun !COMMENT_END', 'Very unique idea! And a very well written scene!COMMENT_END', 'Good dialogue and I love how we just stole everything from the guards to throw random stuff at them! Crafting in the middle of a turn-based combat is an interesting idea.COMMENT_END', 'Nice job on getting the RPG fundamentals down. You have a knack for writing I think, some of that dialogue was very funny. I think that your combination of crafting and RPG battles is cool. Nice work!COMMENT_END']

['Could be good example of educational application for programming, well done!COMMENT_END', 'Very interesting and challenging gameCOMMENT_END', 'I brought back the same pleasure I felt when I achieved efficiency while programming.COMMENT_END', 'The mechanic is so much fun, one of the best game I playedCOMMENT_END', 'WOW fantastic concept! ["One of my favourites, but then I'm a sucker for puzzle games. Really well done\xa0:)COMMENT_END", 'I really enjoyed the game! I would love to see more mechanics added to itCOMMENT_END', 'This was a cool puzzle game! I like the mechanic of traveling along the light it lead to some interesting puzzles. Implemented the use of switching the reflectors and riding the light really well.The puzzles were the perfect balance of difficult and interesting to keep me captivated.The eerie tone of the music gives you an uneasy feeling, but in a "I\'m stuck in a never-ending labyrinth" sort of way. Very well done!COMMENT_END', 'realy love thisCOMMENT_END', 'Loved this! \xa0One of my favorite games so far.\xa0\xa0Riding the light was really fun.\xa0 Great mechanics. \xa0Clever puzzles.\xa0\xa0Very fun to play. \xa0Excellent!COMMENT_END', 'Really fun puzzle game. (I missed 2 coins somewhere! :( :( )COMMENT_END', 'Really well poolished and cool game, Good job for a week im anticipating a continuation in round2COMMENT_END', 'Yes, really loved this game. ['Super cool! Very well thought out concept and level! Good job! :DCOMMENT_END', 'Very nice 3D\xa0platformer with quite a big level. I lost the purple ball at some point unfortunately (when you have to hit the big red button). Also I agree with MessMess that the precision platforming on the tiny platforms in the very beginning felt a bit too hardcore, especially given the easier section that comes just after.COMMENT_END', "Your game is amazing. I liked the platforming, especially near the start area with the sneaky placed hidden star to find. I got quite far and the pull and push mechanics are well implemented. I tried a number of things to get the bouncy ball to the switch but I couldn't figure it out unfortunately so I had to stop at 8 stars. I like the interesting challenges you created and the generous respawn spots definitely helpedCOMMENT_END", "Tough game but I love that it doesn't make you do everything again after falling. Some of the interactions with the boxes and balls could have used more polish even if you cant fix every bug : )COMMENT_END", "A lot of work went into this one.\xa0 It's a very tricky platformer, but it did let you restart play quickly after failing.\xa0 I got stuck attempting to get the very first star, which was hidden below the main plarform.\xa0 The instructions were well done.COMMENT_END", "It's flawless. It feels like I'm seeing a game that's already on sale.COMMENT_END", "Some tough puzzles in there, I had to quit after getting only 5 stars\xa0because I'm trying to play and rate all the games. I think you did well with the mechanics and it's a fun game. Good work!COMMENT_END", "I had a lot of fun playing this one! I also really liked the attention to details, like the instructions, cube flipping for double jump or spinning for dash, etc...\xa0 My main suggestion would be, purely for the sake of getting yourself the best rating you can, try to make it extra clear what you consider your main two mechanics.\xa0 I assumed platforming and moving the blocks?\xa0 But I wasn't super sureCOMMENT_END", 'Fun playtformer!The way you animate the players movement makes it feel very alive, even without any assets!COMMENT_END', "I couldn't beat it, but I\xa0could see the value. Great job, wonderful prototypeCOMMENT_END", "Absolutely loved the first few moments and then got to the sprint double-jump combo and after six failed attempts, I had enough.\xa0 It's probably easier for others, but I'm not sure why it's so challenging right at the beginning.\xa0\xa0Great looking game, that I would like to play more of, but I would need an easier mode.COMMENT_END", 'LOVED THE GAME! very fun, i think its lacking sprites, art and models, but i get its hard in the 14 day time limit, the captions were very funny, love this game an dam excited to see what you do with it (if you end up doing something with it)COMMENT_END', 'I liked the game! I just found a bit, robotic the movements, but otherwise, this is great!COMMENT_END', 'Very fun game, good puzzle platformer with simple but still interesting mechanics! Loved the entry, good job!COMMENT_END', 'Fun time mastering the attract/repel mechanic. I only had to die 32 times :)COMMENT_END', 'Very fun game - I did accidently lose the cube you had to step on - but otherwise great.COMMENT_END', 'Really awesome 3D platformer! very nice, fast and snappy physics, and good platforming challenges. great level design overall. Nice!COMMENT_END', "I loved this game. I love 3d platformers and platformers in general so this was great. The movement felt tight and there were a good number of mechanic with the dash and double jump and different obstacles to get around. I think I cheated a bit cuz I was able to get ontop of the wall and completely bypass the section where you're supposed to launch a box into the switch. My only complaint is that the game made me stop playing when I got the flag, and that's when I noticed I only got 9/10 stars. I would've loved to go back and find that last star. Really great job on this I had so much fun playing it.COMMENT_END", 'The yellow box got lost in walls :(COMMENT_END']

['Very fun game and the visual effects are great, especially when you crash.\xa0I agree with what has already been said about the controls and it would make a massive difference to the gameplay. Nevertheless, I managed to get a high score of 11. I like how the enemy UFO can fly on a diagonal and all of the interactions with the asteroids are really great, overall a very solid entryCOMMENT_END', "Visual elements are good and mechanics are good fit to task, congrats! I found controls a little bit confusing bc it is unusual and I am not sure how to use pulling beam because asteroids didn't damage the enemy. Still it was enough to be good!COMMENT_END", "The best I managed to do was to shoot one ship, I mean they are so good at shooting and I'm not very goot at positioning myself cleverly. But I like how you can't choose to go backwards, and how this is basically a game about multitasking simultaneously with asteroids and aliens. Good job!COMMENT_END", 'Like others have said, the controls were the biggest issue. To me at least the physic object rocks looked a bit wonky when just bouncing off of other objects. Maybe a bit too loud for my ears, but that is just a preference.COMMENT_END', 'Others have said this too, but intuitive controls would help!\xa0 All in all though, I thought the movement was fun and unique, and it had solid potential!COMMENT_END', 'The explosion effect is cool. Using S to shoot is quite counter-intuitive. Was it chosen that way intentionally? It makes the\xa0game\xa0quite\xa0challenging. Since the tractor beam can be used to hurt yourself I found it easier not to use it, and I ended up not using it at all. My\xa0top score was\xa07:COMMENT_END', 'The controls feel a bit unintuitive, but works well, nice job!COMMENT_END', 'Good start!COMMENT_END', "i got addicted to this for a little while, ngl. i thought this submission was really cool. it's got this neat retro feel to it. the controls were a little awkward at first but i didn't really see what the big deal was. nobody said you had to make an easy game lol, the difficulty added to the fun for me. the movement and shooting (both fully automatic and precision) in themselves were fun, but the tractor beam adds a lot of character on top. i think a cool future addition would be additional heart pickups :) i hope you had fun making it, i'm coming back to this one.COMMENT_END", 'It made me feel like im controlling the ufo. The only problem is, i dont know how to control a ufo xD Good Job!COMMENT_END', "Unfortunately my brain can't get a handle on the controls\xa0ð\x9f\x98©COMMENT_END", "I liked the style of the game and the effects. It's noticeable that you did your best)COMMENT_END", 'Nice Game but the other commenters are correct about the controls .COMMENT_END', "Oh man it's frustrating, the game looks so cool but is unplayable for me, why did you choose such weird controls. I'll refrain from rating as the problem may be with me, I\xa0just wanted to give this feedback.COMMENT_END", "Cool little game. The controls were a bit awkward for me because I'm used to S being down, especially when w is up and d is right.COMMENT_END"]

["Its a cool idea! It could be turned into a great puzzle game. Only downside was that I didn't have enough time to read the\xa0\xa0instructions before it disappeared.. :PCOMMENT_END", "I really liked this game a lot. \xa0Very clever and unique mechanics.\xa0\xa0One small quibble, it's possible to move platforms into positions that you can't get them back from - suddenly making progression impossible (although\xa0I don't know how you would stop that).\xa0\xa0Still, this was a great game - one of my favorites.COMMENT_END", 'The instructions with the magnet disappeared before i could read them but i did read them in the description, the magnetic ability was awesome, and the dashing and movements\xa0work really well. Good job!COMMENT_END', 'Well done!COMMENT_END', "This was fun! I really like the magnet mechanics it adds a lot to the game over basic platforming. Also I like the secret speedrun tech to finish the game in like 20 seconds haha. I did hit a softlock with the purple ball getting stuck on the ground and not being able to respawn it, but it's close to the start so not a huge deal to get back there. Great job on this!COMMENT_END", 'Nice idea, and I loved the gameplay, really coolCOMMENT_END', 'Very interesting idea. It was fun messing with the platforms and using them to with other things in the environment to solve puzzles. Very fun!COMMENT_END', 'Cool game with lots of interesting mechanics.\xa0 Controlling the magnetic platforms was tricky at first, but become a lot of fun.\xa0 I\xa0see much potential in this if developed further.COMMENT_END', 'Nice job, it is actually really fun, I loved the simplicity and the graphics, art design top marks, I would suggest having a skill tree to improve the jumping, in order to assist in those jumps, but nice one!COMMENT_END', "that was awesome. I really liked the core mechanic and I think you've got the art of slowly building difficulty down pretty well. I think some careful adjustments would improve it, like having a little raised floor that stops the ball in the ball puzzle, or maybe have the ball stop when it reaches a really really low speed, because I got hung up on that puzzle (a puzzle which i thought was really cool and well-designed, by the way), but I got hung up simply on praying for the ball to stop when otherwise I felt I had solved it. If that makes sense.but yes stick with this core mechanic or reuse in future games, because it's a winner for sureCOMMENT_END", 'Was fun playing this on stream!\xa0 Really unique mechanic.\xa0 The idea of pushing and pulling the environment is really cool.COMMENT_END', "Great game, although a bit difficult for me. Similar to HalfSmore, I felt the game introduced mechanics too quickly. Honestly, I felt pretty confused. Although, that's not the point of the task, so I still gave you a great score because I see the potential and the mechanics were implemented well. The gameplay was still fun, anyway. Cheers!COMMENT_END", "Fun game! The visuals were simple but could have been a little bit cleaner (for example some of the red was different shades). I'd also recommend reducing the amount of different colors. For example, black is clearly a platform and red is clearly death but one room in particular I walked in and now there's a lot more stuff introduced at once (even though the mechanics are mostly the same) which was kind of overwhelming. Speedrunning was fun and the controls felt nice. I'd recommend using a color palette (like fromlospec) just to give it a bit more cohesiveness visually, and it's a very small change that can be very impactful.\xa0The UI was also just at random points in my screen which was a little bit odd. Hope you make it to the next round as I'm really excited to see where this goes!COMMENT_END", "Fun game! The visuals and controls are clean and overall it's pretty fun! Seems like a fun speedrun game too, maybe leaning in to that concept could make it even better.COMMENT_END", 'pretty fun game with a pretty cool concept. i was able to win it in 25 seconds though by flying over the top of the map using the magnet board thing.COMMENT_END']

['nice survival game candifiedCOMMENT_END', 'Very fun and very clever game !COMMENT_END', 'One of my favorite games so far.\xa0\xa0The mechanics all worked smoothly and the upgrades were fun. \xa0Really well implemented game. \xa0Very fun!COMMENT_END', 'Cool game! It reminds me of that old mobile game where you squish the bugs as they run across the screen... I really enjoyed it but i think it should be more obvious when youve grabbed something but apart from that i really enjoyed itCOMMENT_END', 'ah yes killing bugs my cat would love thisreally liked the game would play this when im with ma cat aroundvery well executed, nice work man!COMMENT_END', "Super fun and addicting game!\xa0My only advice would be that some of the upgrades didn't feel as impactful as\xa0I would have liked, for example lvl 4 damage increase still took 2 hits to kill a basic ant, the same amount at lvl 0, and 3 hits for one of the stronger ones which I think was the same for like level 1 or 2. I would love to see how it's expanded upon, like more unique upgrades that have cool synergies for example or puzzles and new methods of combat with the two core mechanics here.\xa0Also as a pretty small nitpick punching the candy felt\xa0 very punishing which led to me avoiding the punch radius mechanics, maybe it could be lessened or the upgrade that protects against ant or hold damage would also help for punches. Who gave the ants shields!!!???COMMENT_END', 'Great game! Really enjoyed this, and loved the art!COMMENT_END', 'Perfect job and very good choice as game style for this task. Smooth gameplay and cute visuals.COMMENT_END', 'Fun and intuitive game. It fits the theme beautifully and and has great music and art design. Great job!COMMENT_END', 'Before playing it, I thought it was a familiar genre, but it actually showed creativity.COMMENT_END', 'All this violence paired with suchSWEETmusic!COMMENT_END', "This is a really fun game and very easy to understand. One of the best I've played so farCOMMENT_END", 'Super fun game I found out I really enjoy killing ants.COMMENT_END', 'Lots of fun!COMMENT_END', 'So addictive and fun - my favourite game in the jam!COMMENT_END', "I love ants so killing so many of them hurt my soul, but otherwise very well done game!\xa0Good pixel art, animations and mechanics, you're going to go far this way.COMMENT_END", 'Even though I enjoyed the gameplay, the idea seemed strange to me (I mean having to protect candy from ants).COMMENT_END', "Very fun game! ["Fun and well-done game. I constantly forgot to do my movements before attacking and basically lost because of that :') but gaining new attacks &\xa0trying to be strategic to efficiently eliminate everyone was entertaining.COMMENT_END", 'This is really neat! ['My experience:COMMENT_END', "Really cool game. I liked the vibe of the game a lot and the monster scared me pretty good the first time it showed up. ['This was my review from the Construct \xa0jam "Absolutely adore the look of this game. \xa0You do a great job creating atmosphere (even the opening scroll). \xa0\xa0I wish I\xa0was better at this type of \xa0game, I got my but kicked.\xa0\xa0Still, it was very impressive." \xa0Played it again here and I got a little better. :)COMMENT_END', 'Extremely janky control schema that honestly ruined the game for me. The graphics and graphical style were interesting but gameplay is king and I can not give this a good score on that grounds.COMMENT_END', 'Took me a while to be able to do more than just die. Very difficult game, but fun. Good work!COMMENT_END', "Wow, I'd been looking forward to playing this one just from the art style but it did not disappoint in gameplay either! The combat system was a little difficult at first but I was able to pick it up before long, at a really good pace actually. The boss fights were varied and interesting all around. Really great game, would love to see you keep working on this!COMMENT_END", 'This is a great entry. I really like the art style and the gameplay seems cool but Iâ\x80\x99d echo what Brainfart mentioned below and I could not get the input scheme to work for me. I could be ok with the right click to move but Iâ\x80\x99d prefer if it was allowed to keep it holder for continuous movement. Still, Iâ\x80\x99d rather have a twin-stick OR WASD+mouse movement.\nAlso, I the scissors go way too far out. I lose track of where they are. Itâ\x80\x99d be nice if they stayed closer and maybe inflict continuous damage OR stay in-view so I can plan for them to damage something on the way back to me when I recall them.COMMENT_END', 'Man, this was fun playing on stream.\xa0 Like I said, your overall game design is always spot on.\xa0 Definitely one of the styles on my inspiration list.\xa0 (Ugh...Riri!)COMMENT_END', "This game is so awesome, one of my favorites from the jam for sure. Once I got a hang of it it was really fun to kill all the bosses, the only one that gave me trouble was the one that leaves a fire trail behind it. I think the story and vibe of the game with the art and music is just great. The controls are pretty weird, I'd really like to be able to hold the mouse to move rather than having to spam click constantly while playing. Really great work on this I loved it.COMMENT_END", 'great game and art and cinematic star-wars sequence at the beginning! The bosses felt really strong but rewarding once you beat one of them (the reduced FOV guy was especially strong). Nice workCOMMENT_END', 'Very fun game! Good job :DCOMMENT_END', 'Ay, very nice game! Was a bit confused about controls, but than i figured it out. Beat first boss without taking damage on 3rd try :) Well done! Hope to see this game in the next roundsCOMMENT_END', 'AMAZING GAME! Amazing art Amazing story and i like how the mechanics lead into eachother! but i do have a couple nitpicks, the characther moves way too slow, and you can accidently dash WAY too far by just holding left click, this makes the game really a game of tanking damage and kill it before it kills you, which really decentive me from replaying it to get no-hit runs, the first time playing it its way too hard, and the second way too easy!! but overall still an amazing game, i had fun with the easier bosses where i could actually dodge and kinda run away the feedback is only kinda directed to the harder bossesCOMMENT_END', 'Amazing game!COMMENT_END']

['This was a lot fun. Well done!COMMENT_END', 'Very good game, amazing idea, and beautiful graphics. 5/5COMMENT_END', 'I only made it to level 4.\xa0The mechanics were awesome and I think matches the prompt a were very well done, though the attacking was a bit awkward to get used to.COMMENT_END', 'i really like the style of having a 1:1 monitor feel to it.the music is really good aswell.had fun playing itCOMMENT_END', 'Fun game with great art and music. I recommend searching how input buffering works in video games. Still, I would love to see your ideas expanded on.COMMENT_END", "Overall great game, I love the aesthetics, music, and gameplay. Other than that, the game is great .COMMENT_END', "I really like this game! The style and music are awesome, and the spin on the classic mechanic of frogger is awesome too.The combat mechanic is the most unorthodox/innovative part, and at first it was unintuitive to walk into an enemy to attack them. However, once it became clear, partially due to the nice clean sword swing animation, it was a cool, minimal way to do combat.\xa0I have one suggestion to kind of mitigate this, which is to have the very first enemy you kill be one that just wanders around and can't even hurt you. then the player will learn how to attack without the risk of failing before they know what they're doing. you can also have destructible crates/objects that can get the point across as well.but anyway, i really liked the gameplay and aesthetics of this!!!COMMENT_END", "This was fun! Great job on this it's fun!COMMENT_END", 'Solid game with great and consistent graphics. It would be awesome to see the secondary mechanic developed further in a later round. Good luck!COMMENT_END']
